overview: When fertility doctor Dava Foxx treats her son-in-law Brad Knight he accidentally inseminates her instead of filling the cup for his wife. MILF Cherie DeVille reluctantly models for her step son Brad Knight's photography project, gradually undressing till things get out of hand. Contact shy Seth Gamble only succumbs to his massage when he realizes that his redhead masseuse Penny Pax looks just like his sister. Romeo Price pitches in for his step mom Nina Elle's Nuru spa promo shoot by posing with Cristi Ann after the male model cancels. Nuru masseuse sisters Kagney Linn Karter and Britney Amber tag team their step father Tommy Gunn to give him the royal treatment.
title: Family Business
